document.docAuthor: Lucena, Rudá Amorim & Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of Brazilian sea spiders (Arthropoda: Pycnogonida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of Brazilian sea spiders (Arthropoda: Pycnogonida)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Original name:
Halosoma marcusi Mello-Leitão, 1949a : 168
–173, figs 1 –4 (Brazil: Rio de Janeiro).

Syn.:
Anoplodactylus robustus
—Zilberberg, 1963: 25–27, figs 5–7 ( Brazil : Ilha de Trindade, 40 m ) (non Dohrn, 1881).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Type locality: Urca , Rio de Janeiro .

subSubSection.paragraph: Ecological note: Found on colony of hydroids.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus maritimus Hodgson, 1914
—
Stock, 1992 : 131
(Brazil: São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, 19–73 m ). Syn.:
Anoplodactylus parvus
—Giltay, 1934.

materialsCitation.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus massiliformis
Stock, 1974
: 1063
–1066, figs 48–49 ( Brazil : off Amapá ,
85 m
). Holotype : ZMA .PYC.P.1091.

subSubSection.paragraph: Ecological note: On calcareous sand, sponges and rubble.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus mirim Lucena, de
Araújo & Christoffersen, 2015
: 432
–435, figs 6–11 (Brazil: Paraíba, intertidal to 30 m ).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Type locality: Barra de Mamanguape , Paraíba , Brazil .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus monotrema Stock, 1979
—
Stock, 1992 : 131
(Brazil: São Paulo, off Espírito Santo, intertidal to 41 m ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.:
Halosoma robustum
— Marcus, 1940c : 68–71, fig 8a–c ( Brazil : São Paulo , 0–5 m ) (non Dohrn, 1881).
Anoplodactylus robustus
—Stock, 1954 (non Dohrn, 1881).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Type locality: Santa Marta Bay , Curaçao .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ecological note: On intertidal algae
Dictyota
sp.

Anoplodactylus petiolatus ( Krøyer, 1844 )
— Sawaya, 1949 : 73 ( Brazil : Rio de Janeiro , shallow water).— Stock, 1992 : 131–132 ( Brazil : off
Rio Grande do Sul
, Santa Catarina , off Paraná , São Paulo , Rio de Janeiro , Espírito Santo , 16–150 m ).

Syn.:
Phoxichilidium mutilatum
—Frey & Leuckart, 1847.
Pallene attenuata
—Hodge, 1863.

Phoxichilidium longicolle
—Dohrn, 1881.
Phoxichilidium pygmaeum
— Hoek, 1881 (non Hodge, 1864).
Anaphia petiolate
—Lebour, 1916.

materialsCitation.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus spurius
Stock, 1992
: 132
–134, figs 65–75 ( Brazil : off Rio de Janeiro , Espírito Santo ,
1–220 m
). Holotype : ZMA .PYC.P.1105.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Type locality: off Rio de Janeiro ( 23°59'S 43°01'W ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus stictus
Marcus, 1940
c: 65
–68, pl VI fig 7e–f, pl VII fig 7a–d (Brazil: São Paulo, shallow water).—
Sawaya, 1945 : 231
–234, figs 1–2 (Brazil: Paraná).—
Stock, 1992 : 134
, fig 62 (Brazil: off Santa Catarina, off Paraná, São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Espírito Santo, infralittoral to 250 m ).—
Varoli, 1994 : 625
(Brazil: São Paulo).—
Varoli, 1996 : 42
(Brazil: São Paulo).—
Széchy & Paula, 2000 : 130
(Brazil: Rio de Janeiro, 0–2 m ).—
Bettim & Haddad, 2013 : 320
, fig 2 (Brazil: Paraná).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality: Baia de Santos
,
São Paulo
.

Ecological note: On
Sargassum cymosum C. Agardh
and
S. rigidulum Kuetzing
growing on the infralittoral of

rocky shore, parasite of hydroid
Podocoryna
sp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anoplodactylus typhlops Sars, 1888
—
Child, 1982 : 21
(Brazil: off Pernambuco, 587 m ). Syn.:
Anaphia typhlops
—Norman, 1908.
